冠 guān (OC: koon MC: kʷɑn) 古丸切 平 廣韻：【首飾説文曰絭也所以絭髮弁冕之緫名也亦姓風俗通云古賢者鶡冠子之後又音灌 】
HAT
specifically>OFFICIAL HAT
one who wears such>RULER

冠 guàn (OC: koons MC: kʷɑn) 古玩切 去 廣韻：【冠束白虎通曰男子幼娶必冠女子幼嫁必笄又姓列仙傳有仙人冠先又音官 】
WEAR
generalising>COVER
inchoative: ritual marking the beginning of wearing an adult cap>RITUAL

橫 hèng (OC: ɡʷraaŋs MC: ɦʷɯaŋ) 戶孟切 去 廣韻：【非理來又音宏 】
UNRESTRAINED
generalised> INTENSELY
in aggressive action> VIOLENT
figurative: unexpected> SURPRISE

橫 héng (OC: ɡʷraaŋ MC: ɦʷɯaŋ) 戶盲切 平 廣韻：【縱横也又姓風俗通云韓王子成號横陽君其後爲氏戸盲切十六 】
CROSS OVER
HORIZONTAL
橫 guāng (OC: kʷaaŋ MC: kʷɑŋ) 古黃切 平 廣韻：【長安門名又戸觥切 】

item.ref: 橫 ｇｕａｎｇ１《廣韻》古黃切，平唐見。
橫 ｈｕａｎｇ２《集韻》胡光切，平唐匣。

list.item:
次 cì (OC: snʰis MC: tsʰi) 七四切 去 廣韻：【次第也亦三宿曰次又姓吕氏春秋荆有勇士次非七四切九 】
NEXT
what happens next> EVENT
generalised> NEAR
two obects> BETWEEN
be between boundaries> BE IN
replacement for hair> WHIG
feature: but not reaching in quality> BAD
action: put next> REPLACE
specific> DEMOTE
concrete sequence ORDERLY
abstract> ORDER
comprehensive> SYSTEM
action> PREPARE
creation> COMPOSE
military> DWELL
continuative> REMAIN
for an activity> PLACE
building> DWELLING
ceremonial> TENT
for official business> OFFICE
military> CAMP
abstract> RANK
for trade> MARKET
THEREUPON
logical> THEN
temporal> WHEN
=恣 UNRESTRAINED

item.ref: 次 zī《集韻》津私切，平脂精。脂部。
〔次且〕也作“趑趄”。欲進不前的樣子。
次 cí《集韻》才資切，平脂從。
〔具次〕山名。《集韻•脂韻》：“次，具次，山名。”

list.item:
智 zhì (OC: tes MC: ʈɯiɛ) 知義切 去 廣韻：【知也又姓晉有智伯知義切三 】
WISE
exocentric>HERO
exocentric: move>PLAN
trivially>CRAFTY
rhetorically>ELOQUENT
intellectually>INTELLIGENT
=知UNDERSTAND
